script.content: Long ago, when giants roamed the Earth, there was one who sought to be the most powerful. A tower was built in the ancient city of Babylon to reach the heavens, but God destroyed it and scattered people across the world. Thus begins the story of Hayk - the legendary founder and father of armenian nation.
You are in a village near mount Ararat. The tales about the giant who rose against the tyrant have reached you. It's your choice to join and help him in his conquest.
You've reached Haykashen and found Hayk: a giant broad-shouldered man with thick curly hairs, bright eyes and huge arms.
